name: As Sylam
description:
As Sylam is an Adventure game with a twist.

Everything you think you are doing, Could be real, or it could be all in your head.

Help Sylam and his friends through there Adventure, Join the Fighters guild and discover what it really takes to live As Sylam.

Includes turn by turn fighting, Leveling up, weapons and armor of your choosing and much... MUCH more.

If this game Dosen't leave you wanting more, and more, then feel free to leave a comment telling me what to add into the next one.

Or follow THEcoffeeCAT GAMES on Facebook
